name: smodm2

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wsmo(c0)), word(c1))
-| wi(wsmo(c0), word(cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), word(cdm(c0))), word(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wsmo(c0)), word(c1))
-| wi(wsmo(c0), word(cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), word(cdm(c0))), word(c1))

|- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wsmo(c0)), word(c1))
-| wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), word(cdm(c0))), word(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), word(cdm(c0))), word(c1))
-| wi(wfn(c0, c1), wb(word(cdm(c0)), word(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wsmo(c0)), word(c1))
-| wi(wfn(c0, c1), wb(word(cdm(c0)), word(c1)))

stmt.origin: syl(wfn(c0, c1), wb(word(cdm(c0)), word(c1)), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wb(word(cdm(c0)), word(c1)))
-| wi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wb(word(cdm(c0)), word(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wsmo(c0)), word(c1))
-| wi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wb(word(cdm(c0)), word(c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ Smo(c0))→ Ord(c1))
⊣ (c0[Fn]c1 → dom(c0)= c1)
⊣ (dom(c0)= c1 →(Ord(dom(c0))↔ Ord(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wsmo(c0)), word(c1))
-| wi(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wb(word(cdm(c0)), word(c1)))

comment: The domain of a strictly monotone ordinal function is an ordinal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2013.)
